ROBERT F. SCHENKKAN
DIRECTOR
January 23, 1964
Dr. Clair R« Tettemer, Director
NAEB Utilization Project
Station KFME
P. 0. Box 6
Fargo, North Dakota
Dear Clair:
After considering the specifications for selection
of a production agency for the NAEB Utilization Kit Films,
I am submitting the enclosed Motion Picture Cost Estimates,
one to cover 6 films in 16 mm. black and white, one to
cover 6 films in 16 mm. color. You x^ill observe that the
total cost estimate for black and white is $57,500...the
cost estimate for color only $2,500.00 more, or $60,000.00.
Assuming that we could start on the shooting scripts
and production without any further delay, we anticipate
that the film project could be completed under normal
schedule conditions by the end of the year.
We feel that this is an exciting and much-needed
project, one which has been given a great deal of thought
and care, and we would like to have a part in bringing it
to completion.
Sincerely,
Earl J.^Miller
Director of Motion Pictures
Enel. Motion Picture Cost Estimates
